name: Food And Drink 24 Quiz | Mixed Food and Drink | 10 Questions

questions.text: The average cat food meal is equal to how many mice?
What ingredient gives American pumpernickel bread its dark color?
questions.explanation:
Molasses.

	German pumpernickel, in contrast, receives this color naturally, through a very long baking process (up to 24 hours) at low temperatures.

questions.text: Spinach is necessary to make a Florentine dish.
If you served a fried alevin which of these would you be serving?
The average child will eat about how many pounds of cereal in a year?
What has liquid come to when it rolls, bubbles, and steams?
What is the main ingredient of faggot?
Which is not a type of mushroom?
What kind of sauce is traditionally served with pork?
